title: SIPENDIBAR: New Student Administration System
desc: Developed a Spring Boot information system to accommodate the registration process for the new student of Pesantren Persatuan Islam 69 Matraman. This project is part of of learning PROPENSI courses. PROPENSI is one of the courses in the Faculty of Computer Science, University of Indonesia.

title: Nutricare: Meal Planner Android App
desc: A meal planner app that consists of three paths of learning (Android, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing). Created a native android app based on kotlin with authentication and chatbot features. The application has a real-time connection to Smart Chatbot and food recommendation API. The app uses encrypted share pref to store current users' data safely and stores chat messages using a local database (room database).

title: Lagu App: Website to Find Songs and Artists
desc: A simple website built with ReactJS to find songs and artists using Last.FM API. This website was created as a personal exercise in learning React

title: To-Do App: Simple To-Do App Built with Kotlin
Simple CRUD Website Built with NextJS
